item.title: Analysis with Regularization on Brazilian elections
item.description:
Introduction Data Analysis with multivariate Linear Regression on data about polls for the 2006 and 2010 elections in Brazil for the lower house (Câmara Federal de Deputados). Data was taken from the TSE portal and encompasses approximately 7300 candidates.
Data Overview The variables The response variable is the variable that you are interested in reaching conclusions about. A predictor variable is a variable used to predict another variable.
